subject: Re: [junit] Training that focuses on unit testing?
msgSnippet: ... We do entirely customized training, so if you re interested in a phone consultation to design a training program, contact us directly at
messageBody:
Zak Jacobson wrote:

> I am looking for some training for my team in effective unit testing.
> I have found a few through google searches. Does anyone have any
> first hand knowledge they can share?
>
> I'd like a course that can focus on the benefits of unit testing, how
> to use mocks, how to harness the power of TDD, how to sniff out code
> smells that unit testing exposes (and what to do about it).

We do entirely customized training, so if you're interested in a phone
consultation to design a training program, contact us directly at
training@.... Be sure to put [junit] in the subject line
so our spam filter doesn't gobble your e-mail up.

Take care.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.ca
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
